name: Good Morning, Yes!
description: How could anyone say no on such a beautiful morning?

name: Still a Yes
description: Even though it’s not morning anymore, whatever you’re planning sounds blessed.

name: Yes
description: If you don’t do it, you’ll regret it later.

name: Strong and Solid
description: What can I say... I wish my developer had your kind of luck. The answer’s yes.

name: After 2AM, Magic Happens
description: A wise man once said: all great stories start after 2 a.m.

name: Yup!
description: You just gotta be quick—like super quick.

name: Ra!
description: Yes indeed. You must’ve woken up on the right side today.

name: When Night Falls
description: Tonight, luck’s rolling in your favor.

name: Yeah
description: No explanation needed. It’s a yes.

name: Of Course, Yes!
description: Seriously, who would dare say no to that?

name: Bruh, No.
description: What kinda question was that? Obviously not. I don’t get this generation.

name: Drop It
description: Let it go, it’s not worth the brain cells.

name: Nope.
description: No. No. And once again, NO—with authority.

name: Nah, Don’t Think So
description: Can’t say I believe in it, but hey—it’s your call.

name: No.
description: That’s it. Don’t chase it further.

name: Nothing Good After 2AM
description: A wise man said: if it’s past 2 a.m., just sleep. No good decision happens now.

name: Nope!
description: You’re either hungry or just had lunch—you’re not thinking straight. So yeah, no.

name: Feels Shady
description: My vibes say no. Something’s off about it.

name: Honestly, No
description: One day you’ll thank me for showing you this path.

name: Never
description: Another life, maybe. But not this one.

name: I Swear I Don’t Know
description: Maybe... the universe is still loading.

name: Let It Go, Homayoun
description: The secret of life is letting go—you won’t get it till you feel it.

name: Doesn’t Matter
description: Seriously, look around you.

name: Can’t Say
description: I can’t answer that, man. I’ll refer you to my friend, Mr. Hafez.

name: Whatever Happens
description: Let the universe take the wheel.

name: Balance
description: There’s order in chaos—just not your kind of order.

name: Someone’s Under the Couch
description: When you lose yourself completely, that’s when the answer comes.

name: Wait a Minute
description: Now’s not the time for questions—maybe later, dude.

name: Gooooy!
description: The answer to everything… is Gooooy!
